column1: namaH sarva budDa boDisattveByaH viMSatikA kArikA vk
column2: @3a * // rgya gar skad du /bing sha ka k'a ri ka / bod skad du / nyi shu pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //

column1: vijQapti mAtram eva etat asat arTa avaBAsanAt
column2: 'di dag rnam par rig tsam nyid // yod pa ma yin don snang phyir //

column1: yaTA tEmirikasya asat keSa candra Adi darSanam
column2: dper na rab rib can dag gis // skra zla la sogs med mthong bzhin //

column1: yadi vijQaptiH anarTAH niyamaH deSa kAlayoH
column2: gal te rnam rig don min na // yul dang dus la nges med cing // sems kyang nges med ma yin la //

column1: santAnasya aniyamaH ca yuktA kRtya kriyA na ca
column2: bya ba byed pa'ang mi rigs 'gyur // yul la sogs pa nges 'grub ste // rmi 'dra'o sems kyang des pa med //

column1: deSa Adiu niyamaH sidDaH svapna vat preta vat punar
column2: yi dags bzhin te thams cad kyis //

column1: santAna aniyamaH sarvEH pUyanadI Adi darSane
column2: klung la rnag la sogs mthong bzhin //

column1: svapna upaGAta vat kRtya kriyA naraka vat punar
column2: bya byed rmi lam gnod pa 'dra // thams cad sems can dmyal ba bzhin //

column1: sarvam naraka pAla Adi darSane tEH ca bADane
column2: dmyal ba'i srung ma sogs mthong dang // de dag gis ni gnod phyir ro //

column1: tiraScAm samBavaH svarge yaTA na narake taTA
column2: ji ltar dud 'gro mtho ris su // 'byung ba de ltar dmyal ba min / yi dags min te 'di lta bur //

column1: na pretAnAm yatas tad jam duHKam na anuBavanti te
column2: de yod sdug bsngal des mi myong //

column1: yadi tad karmaBiH tatra BUtAnAm samBavaH taTA izyate pariNAmaH ca kim vijQAnasya na izyate
column2: gal te de yi las kyis der // 'byung ba dag ni 'byung ba dang // de bzhin 'gyur bar 'dod na go // rnam par shes par cis mi 'dod //

column1: karmaNaH vAsanA anyatra Palam anyatra kalpyate
column2: gzhan na las kyi bag chags la // 'bras bu dag ni @3b gzhan du rtog /

column1: tatra eva na izyate yatra vAsanA kim nu kAraNam
column2: gang na bag chags yod pa der // ci yi phyir na 'dod mi bya //

column1: rUpa Adi Ayatana astitvam tat vineya janam prati
column2: gzugs sogs skye mched yod par ni // des 'dul ba yi skye bo la /

column1: aBiprAya vaSAt uktam upapAduka sattva vat
column2: dgongs pa'i dbang gis gsungs pa ste // rdzus te 'byung ba'i sems can bzhin //

column1: yatas sva bIjAt vijQaptiH yad ABAsA pravartate
column2: rang gis bon gang las su // rnam rig snang ba gang 'byung ba //

column1: dviviDa Ayatana tvena te tasyAH muniH abravIt
column2: de dag de yi skye mched ni //

column1: taTA pudgala nErAtmya praveSaH hi hi anyaTA punar
column2: rnam pa gnyis su thub pas gsungs // de ltar gang zag bdag med par // 'jug par 'gyur ro gzhan du yang //

column1: deSanA Darma nErAtmya praveSaH kalpita AtmanA
column2: bstan pas chos la bdag med par // 'jug 'gyur brtags pa'i bdag nyid kyis //

column1: na tat ekam na ca anekam vizayaH paramANuSaH
column2: de ni gcig na'ang yul min la // phra rab rdul du du ma'ang min //

column1: na ca te saMhatAH yasmAt paramANuH na siDyati
column2: de dag 'dus pa'ang ma yin te // 'di ltar rdul phran mi 'grub phyir //

column1: zawkena yugapad yogAt paramANoH zaz aMSa tA
column2: drug gis cig car sbyar ba na // phra rab rdul cha drug tu 'gyur // drug po dag ni go gcig na //

column1: zaNNAm samAna deSa tvAt piNxaH syAt aNu mAtrakaH
column2: gong bu rdul phran tsam du 'gyur //

column1: paramANoH asaMyoge tad saFGAte sti kasya saH
column2: rdul phran sbyor ba med na ni // de 'dus yod pa de gang gis //

column1: na ca anavayava tvena tad saMyogaH na siDyati
column2: cha shas yod pa ma yin pas / de sbyor mi 'grub ma zer cig /

column1: diS BAga BedaH yasya asti tasya ekatvam na yujyate
column2: gang la phyogs cha tha dad yod // de ni gcig tu mi rung ngo //

column1: CAyA AvRtI kaTam vA anyaH na piNxaH ced na tasya te
column2: grib dang sgrib par ji ltar 'gyur // gong bu gzhan min de de'i min // gcig ni rim gyis 'gro ba med //

column1: eka tve na krameNa itiH yugapad na graha AgrahO
column2: zin dang ma zan cig car med //

column1: vicCinna aneka vRttiH ca sUkzma anIkzA ca naH Bavet
column2: ris chad du mar gnas pa dang // mig gis mi sod phra ba'ang med //

column1: pratyakza budDiH svapna AdO yaTA sA ca yadA tadA
column2: mngon sum blo ni rmi sogs bzhin // de yang gang tshe de yi tshe //

column1: na saH rTaH dRSyate tasya pratyakza tvam kaTam matam
column2: khyod kyi don de mi snang na // de ni mngon sum ji ltar 'dod //

column1: uktam yaTA tad ABAsA vijQaptiH smaraNam tatas
column2: dper na der snang rnam rig bzhin // bshad zin de las dran par zad //

column1: svapne dRS vizaya aBAvam na aprabudDaH vagacCati
column2: rmi lam mthong ba yul med par // ma sad bar du rtogs ma yin //

column1: anyonya aDipati tvena vijQapti niyamaH miTas
column2: gcig la gcig gi dbang gis na // rnam par rig pa phan tshun des //

column1: midDena upahatam cittam svapne tena asamam Palam
column2: sems ni gnyid kyis non pas na // de phyir rmi dang 'bras mi mtshungs //

column1: maraNam para vijQapti viSezAt vikriyA yaTA
column2: 'chi ba gzhan gyi rnam rig gis // bye brag las te dper bya na //

column1: smRti lopa AdikAni ezAm piSAca Adi manaH vaSAt kaTam vA daNxaka araNya SUnya tvam Rzi kopataH
column2: 'dre la sogs pa'i yid dbang gis // gzhan gyi dran nyams 'gyur sogs bzhin // drang srong khros pas dan ta ka'i // dgon pa ji ltar stongs par gyur //

column1: manodaNxaH mahAvadyaH kaTam vA tena siDyati
column2: yid nyes kha na tho cher // de mis ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur //

column1: para citta vidAm jQAnam ayaTArTam kaTam yaTA
column2: gzhan sems rig pas shes pa ni // don bzhin ma yin ji @4a * // ltar dper //

column1: sva citta jQAnam ajQAnAt yaTA budDasya gocaraH
column2: rang sems shes pas sangs rgyas kyi // spyod yul ji bzhin ma shes phyir //

column1: vijQapti mAtra tA sidDiH sva Sakti sadRSI mayA
column2: rnam rig tsam du grub pa 'di // bdag gis bdag gi mthu 'dra bar // byas kyi de yi rnam pa kun //

column1: kRtA iyam sarvaTA sA tu na cintyAH budDa gocaraH
column2: bsam yas sangs rgyas spyod yul lo //
nyi shu pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
